content: it s just a crochet basket instructions 8 half_double_crochet in magic_ring work as spiral marking 1st stitch with locking stitch marker and move marker to 1st stitch of each consecutive round round 1 2 half_double_crochet in each st 16 sts round 2 *1 half_double_crochet in next st 2 half_double_crochet in next st repeat from * to materials end of round 24 sts round 3 *1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st repeat from * yarn 1 skein berroco macro to end of round 32 sts 112yd/250g or other jumbo yarn round 4 *1 half_double_crochet in next 3 sts 2 half_double_crochet in the next st repeat color shown snowy owl eyes yellow from * to end of round 40 sts hook 12 mm round 5 *1 half_double_crochet in next 4 sts 2 half_double_crochet in the next st repeat gauge and size from * to end of round 48 sts round 6 single_crochet in the back third loop of each half_double_crochet 48sts 8 stitches in linen stitch x 10 row round 7 *single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 1 skip next single_crochet repeat from * =4 inches around ending round with a chain 1 24 single_crochet 24 chain 1 spaces 7 5 tall x 8 diameter round 8+ *skip 1st single_crochet single_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 repeat abbreviations from * around chain = chain continue working rounds until basket is desired height ours half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet is 16 rounds tall on last round end with a single_crochet and then slip slip_stitch = slip stich stitch into first single_crochet of round do not fasten_off to make loop single_crochet = single_crochet chain 9 turn and slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and in each st s = stitch stitches remaining chains 8 slip stitches going through the free end of the loop slip_stitch into the first single_crochet again to close loop and then fasten_off attach button to outside of basket opposite of the loop darnknitanyway com ©2024 darn knit anyway all rights reserved this is a free pattern stillwater mn 651-342-1386 we hope you make beautiful crochet items for yourself or your loved ones
